showerReviews.reviewText: Very kind & cordial folks! The week time lady was very polite & cleaned the shower & bathrooms directly after others & was beyond responsive to other customers as well. Not a large spot but certainly a little oasis in the TN mtns. Only …

Racist ladies at that front register..  1 shower avail. Put my name and num on list and got skipped. I asked why ppl where going ahead of me while I had beeb told I was next after the person who was in there. They had no answer and told me …
Parking is tight and scarce, but the staff were wonderful. The best thing was a super clean shower. There's only 1 but they keep it pristine compared to all the others I've used.
Only one shower

locations.content: Pilot Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Worst freaking pilot I as a professional driver has ever been in . 1h and 25min of waiting and I’m next in line for a simple shower. All these freaking teens who don’t want to work and just go on smoke breaks and hide in the employee only …
DONT WAIT IN TRUCK FOR SHOWER AT NIGHT TIME, GO INSIDE …

… as you enter the gas desk because of the smell of washrooms. The guys working are pretty nice but i guess they can’t handle the pressure as they are only 2 guys working at night. My Advice is use a shower instead of going to there washroom.

If you need a shower in the evening the wait is about two hrs.. The guy cleaning showers is very clever. He waits till all the showers are dirty. Then he sprays the floor with disinfectant and uses the last customer's dirty towels and wipes …

Small but sweetly,nice parking,clean area,beautiful shower and huge washroom space,this Pilot deserve five stars,also outside WiFi is great!Many people considering about small parking,they must understand how Tennessee mountain state not …
As for a truck driver, it’s very frustrating and inconvenient when you have no opportunity to take a shower
It’s been 30 min i am waiting for shower but no-one care to clean shower

Waited 2 hours for a shower I went up to the counter and ask the 3 workers do I have to clean a shower so I could shower. Cause shower # 3 was full of glass and they left it like that for the next shift to clean it up . I told them I been …

the showers are never cleaned by the supervisor together with the employee they reset the showers so as not to clean them the worst pilot in which I have been waiting for a shower for two hours and I could never take a bath.
Gotta love a clean pump clean shower pilot

showerReviews.reviewText: So I had a pleasant experience at this Petro. I do prefer them over Ta. I fuel and shower at loves usually but I needed to do a Pm and some other stuff and I don’t use loves for that anymore. …

… which way you want to fall of your bed lol. Store was beat and clean, service providers where in point with greeting abs friendliness. Showers where clean pressure of water was awesome. But….. there is visible mold in the shower, like …

The remodel in the showers gives new meaning to "water closet". Extremely small, terrible ventilation (floors, walls, everything's wet when you're done). Had to step into the shower to open the door to get out.

Very disappointed, my husband and I went to shower and wanted a plate to go from the deli , unfortunately there was a young big lady who refused service to my husband , maybe because he’s Hispanic and before us to an Asian gentleman, we had …

… pumps aren't working. The fuel islands are pretty dirty, and poorly maintained. The showers are pretty clean, but very very hot and humid. You'll be just as sweaty and nasty after your shower as you were before your shower. Not a lot of …

… always a plus. On the other hand, there may be a reason for that. My husband and I decided to take a shower here because we had a lot of time on the load we were under. The showers were very small, and not updated at all. They may have been …

… open another room to use never seen something so lame as this.  Handicapped people have to use it. JUST STUPID.  Ok maybe I was harsh she was just doing her job well. Nice person but still don't clean it without open one shower bathroom.

… Took a shower team shower, was put into a tiny shower than was older than dirt with the old TINEY shower stall with a door that one person could barely turn around in the whole unit let alone two. Switched us to the handicapped shower where …

My wife and I are team truck drivers so we share a shower. The shower was so small both of us barely fit. The restaurant closed the buffet early did not put out a breakfast buffet ended up ordering chicken tenders. Took FOREVER.  The only …
… Good space for dog to chill out.  I actually didn't do much inside except get a shower.  Shower here were clean and no wait.

locations.title: TA Travel Center
locations.content: TA Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText:
On 03.20.25 at 3:45 p.m. I wanted to take a shower and was unable to do so.  Because all the showers were dirty and no one washed them.

Thank you for your professionalism and attitude to customers

Many thanks to Store Manager Jerry for springing into action and hooking us up with a complimentary shower when I walked in with a vomit covered toddler. They also directed my daughter to us a few moments later when she followed with a …

Young tall kid was shower porter. 1 of the cleanest showers I've had out here on the road. Shower 1 was broken, so the only way to have full water pressure was to have water turned ALL the way to hot, and it was TOO HOT. I had weak water …
Clean. Shower was very well taken care of super friendly staff. Huge parking lot. Ta has some good food on their deli. Chicken place was gross
You can browse around stretch your legs go to the bathroom even take a shower I believe if you're a trucker and have no place to go... Yes I would recommend
Great place lots of parking really clean great service nice shower's  can't go wrong stopping there
Very nice truck stop. Clean restrooms and shower rooms.
Good place for a quick shower and food. Right of the interstate I-75S.
The restroom was clean and the shower was clean and well stocked.
Good place to stop get to eat workout and tack a shower

showerReviews.reviewText: Would give 5 stars if I didn’t have to wait over an hour for staff to clean a shower when they have 3 available it need to be cleaned first

I gave it a 3 because the food was fresh in subway but the shower took away the other stars it was disgusting I’m glad I bring shower shoes and my towel and washcloths, all they did was add fresh linen literally no cleaning I probably won’t …
God forbid u take a shower and have teeth to brush and clean ur ears the lady in charge at 4am will set a siren off I guess she don’t know how to wash herself properly
The lady who works around 3-4am will set off a siren if you take a shower guess she don’t wash or brush her teeth properly if she thinks people can take a shower in 5min and be clean

… i was using it i heard a kady say who the hells in there then got yelled at and by an employee because i used the shower restroom and didn’t realize u had to pay to use that restroom 😤 had my 2 year old in my arms . she did not have …

I used this place few times for shower. I can tell you it is not a clean place at all, very disgusting.. They barely clean the shower area, just change the towels, nothing else. Forget about  désinfectants. The toilet unit is always dirty, …

Truckers don’t stop here unless you can take a 5 min shower they will set off a siren if u ain’t out in 10 min 4-5 people working and can’t get anyone to give you service but they can stand around and talk and set sirens off on people tryna …

… I’ve been to so far! Store was extremely clean, stocked and well organized. The shower was extremely clean with plenty of hot water and excellent water pressure.. Truck parking is a bit far but after driving all day it’s refreshing to get …

I asked at the diesel counter how much a shower was and she was very snoody feeling like i was not welcome to buy a shower if i was not a commercial truck driver(also for a non commercial drivers a shower is 15 witch is over priced). other …
First time I use the shower it was not worth $17 the towel they gave me a smell like a piss no soap, no shampoo First and last time 40 more dollar you can rent a room
